name: Kid Paddle
description:
To win the very new Ultra console 3000, Kid Paddle must win the City Game challenge and need to prove he is the king of the video games. But the challenge is serious and Kid will be help by his friends Horace and Big-bang which will become his coaches.You will be able to play to 26 different games. Some of the games are platform, some other are like the old arcade and others like mini games but all integrates the spirit "gore" and politically incorrect of the series of comic strip.
Created by Midam in 1996, the comic strip Kid Paddle is a big success in Europe country. The 9 published albums were sold with more than 2,5 million specimens and the series of animated drawing is one of the best audiences.

shot.caption: Title
You can choose between French and Dutch as language.
Main menu
Intro: Kid's friends tell him about the video game tournament.
There are several places to go where Kid can play different mini games.
At home, Kid can play games he bought, all starring the Little Barbarian.
Instructions
The barbarian is falling down a cliff and must avoid obstacles.
After bouncing on a dragon's belly, we go all the way up again, only faster and without being able to adjust the speed.
The barbarian survived the fall but then gets smashed.
Kid doen't like loosing at all.
Game over screen of the mini games at Kid's place.
At the games shop we can buy more mini games with the Little Barbarian.
At the park. Here, we can accept challenges to beat  mini games in order to win trading cards.
A min game, "Blork-Alarm".
Blork-Alarm: We need to pick the Blorks depicted in the upper left corner and avoid the others.
Won!
We get a card for our victory.
Mini game: Capture little Blorks with the correct colour in the blender.
Mini game: A Blork gets dissected in three pieces. Then pieces of different Blorks move along the screen and we have to pick the ones belonging to the Blork seen before.
Mini game: Choose the clone which is different from the others.
Our brainy friend has set up a training program for us.
Mini game: Should all the toys which do not belong to Kid.
Mini game: Hit the severed doll heads Horace throws at Kid with a bat.
At the tournament. Kid has to beat a certain highscore at each mini game.
"Decapitablork": Basically like Space Invaders, though the axe you throw flies in an arc and can hit several Blorks and you as well.
Got over the necessary score.
"Excreminator": Move a fly along the scrolling screen through dangers like spray, fly swats etc. and eat excrement to get points (No, not kidding!).
"Space Killer"
"Space Killer": Like Asteroids, only that you can move your directly in any direction and the ship is always heading to the right.
